body:
Reported by jazevec:

If I try to equip an item to my creature, and an instant spell cast in response causes it to die, I will be stuck at "select target creature to equip" stage if I have no creatures left. Not completely stuck, but Undo is the only way, and it's basically cheating because I get my mana back.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Stuck at "select target creature to equip"

comments.body: An opponent should not get priority between paying the equipment cost, choosing the target and attaching the equipment. If an instant can be cast after the equipment cost is payed AND before the target for the equipment is chosen, that would be a bug. I can not get that to happen though.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
